{"id":1014310977,"question_id":2877,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1691377715,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"31 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1014310977/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest String That Contains Three Strings","memory":"44.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String minimumString(String a, String b, String c) {\n        \n        // abc, acb, bac, bca, cab, cba\n        List<String> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        list.add(merge(merge(a, b) ,c));\n        list.add(merge(merge(a, c) ,b));\n        list.add(merge(merge(b, a) ,c));\n        list.add(merge(merge(b, c) ,a));\n        list.add(merge(merge(c, a) ,b));\n        list.add(merge(merge(c, b) ,a));\n        String min = list.get(0);\n        \n        for(String s : list){\n            \n            if(s.length()>min.length())\n                continue;\n            \n            if(s.length()<min.length())\n                min = s;\n            \n            if (s.compareTo(min) < 0) {\n                min = s;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return min;\n        \n    }\n    \n    private String merge(String a, String b){\n        \n        if(a.contains(b))\n            return a;\n        \n        int len = Math.min(a.length(), b.length());\n        \n        for(int i=len; i>0; i--){\n            \n            if(a.endsWith(b.substring(0, i)))\n                return a + b.substring(i);\n        }\n        \n        return a+b;\n    }\n    \n    \n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-string-that-contains-three-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
